CatDescriptText: Cutline of related images published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 9, 1961, pg. A12, reads: "Over 500 Attend Junior Mothers'... 'Smart Affairs of 1961'".
TitMainTitle: Junior Mothers club members wearing flapper dance costumes, including from left: Betty Tibbs, Alma Speed Fox, June Stokes, Phyllis Pitts, Frances Bell Nunn, Norma Malone, Vivian Kizee, and Evelyn Anderson, standing in line in front of stage with band, in Horizon room with wooden dance floor and railing and other men and women seated in chairs at tables for the Junior Mothers "Smart Affairs of 1961"
